name: PurrTech: Jamies's Adventure
description:
Jamie works as a customer support in a high-tech company. Not his dream job but not the worst either. But one day, he receives a call that is going to change his life forever. Something massive is happening among his own company and Jamie is about to go on a journey to some places far beyond the sky...

This platformer was developed by a team of 4 members :

- Chloe : our talented art designer

- Matteo and Bruno : Game testers, game designers and pizza managers

-Myself: Coding, sound desing, scenario

This a very first attempt to make a game for all 4 of us and was intended to be published as contender for the Beginners Circle Jam 3. It was way tougher than expected but it was also a lot of fun (we made pretty puch every asset from scratch). We are very proud of what we produced and hope you'll have a little bit of fun as well.
